module.sqlWrap: SELECT Top (@Top) * FROM CallTogether WHERE (PassportId = @PassportId) AND (Status IN(1,2)) ORDER BY OrderId DESC
SELECT * FROM CallTogether WHERE OrderId IN(@OrderIds) ORDER BY OrderId DESC
SELECT Top (@Top) ct.* FROM CallTogether ct inner join Circle c on ct.CircleId= c.CircleId WHERE (ct.OrderId > @MaxId) AND (ct.Status=1) AND (c.Status=1) ORDER BY ct.OrderId DESC
SELECT Top (@Top) ct.* FROM CallTogether ct inner join Circle c on ct.CircleId= c.CircleId WHERE (ct.OrderId < @MinId) AND (ct.Status=1) AND (c.Status=1) ORDER BY ct.OrderId DESC
SELECT Top 1 * FROM CallTogether WHERE (OrderId=@Id) AND (Status=1) ORDER BY OrderId DESC
Update CallTogether SET Status=2 WHERE PassportId=@PassportId AND OrderId=@OrderId

Update CallTogether SET BannerUrl=@BannerUrl,Title = @Title,Contents=@Contents,ExpectNumber=@ExpectNumber,LimitedNumber=@LimitedNumber,Address=@Address,EndTime=@EndTime,ActivityTime=@ActivityTime,RMBPrice = @RMBPrice WHERE PassportId=@PassportId AND OrderId=@OrderId
SELECT Top (@Top) * FROM CallTogether WHERE (CircleId = @CircleId) and (OrderId > @MaxId) AND (Status=1) ORDER BY OrderId DESC
SELECT Top (@Top) * FROM CallTogether WHERE (CircleId = @CircleId) and (OrderId < @MinId) AND (Status=1) ORDER BY OrderId DESC
